script.name: disqus_classic
script.content: "var timeout; var counter = 0; var timer_is_on=false; function shouldProcessState(){ var state = $('a[id=dsq-paginate-next]').attr('id') != null; return state; } function fireStateEvent(){ var element = $('a[id=dsq-paginate-next]'); element.click(); } function doOperationOnState(){ var links = $('a[href]').attr('href'); var requestObject = {links:links,response:getSerializedDom(),pages:counter,isLast:false}; if(shouldProcessState()){ chrome.extension.sendRequest(requestObject); fireStateEvent(); counter=counter+1; timeout=setTimeout('doOperationOnState()',5000); } else { requestObject.isLast = true; chrome.extension.sendRequest(requestObject); } } function getSerializedDom(){ var serializer = new XMLSerializer(); var xml = serializer.serializeToString(document); return xml; } function fireStateEvents(){ if (!timer_is_on){ timer_is_on=true; timeout=setTimeout('doOperationOnState()',5000); } }function scrollToComment() { var element = document.getElementById('disqus_thread'); if (element != null) { var actualTop = element.offsetTop; var current = element.offsetParent; while (current !== null) { actualTop += current.offsetTop; current = current.offsetParent; } scroll(0, actualTop); } setTimeout('fireStateEvents()',5000); } $(document).ready(function(){$.getScript('http://sitename.disqus.com/embed.js', function() {var loader = setInterval(function() { if($('#disqus_thread').html().length) { clearInterval(loader); disqusReady(); } }, 1000); }); scrollToComment();});"

script.name: disqus_showmore
script.content: "var timeout;var counter = 0;var timer_is_on = false;function shouldProcessState() {var state = $('a[title=Next]').attr('href') != null;return state;}function fireStateEvent() {var element = $('a[title=Next]');element.click();}function doOperationOnState() {var links = $('a').attr('href');var requestObject = {links : links,response : getSerializedDom(),pages : counter,isLast : false};if (shouldProcessState()) {chrome.extension.sendRequest(requestObject);fireStateEvent();counter = counter + 1;timeout = setTimeout('doOperationOnState()', 10000);} else {requestObject.isLast = true;chrome.extension.sendRequest(requestObject);}}function getSerializedDom() {var serializer = new XMLSerializer();var xml = serializer.serializeToString(document);return xml;}function fireStateEvents() {if (!timer_is_on) {timer_is_on = true;timeout = setTimeout('doOperationOnState()', 3000);}}function scrollToComment() {var element = document.getElementById('disqus_thread');if (element != null) {var actualTop = element.offsetTop;var current = element.offsetParent;while (current !== null) {actualTop += current.offsetTop;current = current.offsetParent;}scroll(0, actualTop);}fireStateEvents();}$(document).ready(function() {$.getScript('http://sitename.disqus.com/embed.js', function() {var loader = setInterval(function() {if ($('#disqus_thread').html().length) {clearInterval(loader);disqusReady();}}, 1000);});setTimeout('scrollToComment()', 5000);});"

script.name: disqus_loadmore
script.content: "var timeout;var counter = 0;var timer_is_on = false;var is_send = false;function shouldProcessState() {var state = $('a[class=dsq-more-button]').attr('class') != null;return state;}function fireStateEvent() {var element = $('a[class=dsq-more-button]');element.click();}function doOperationOnState() {if (shouldProcessState()) {fireStateEvent();setTimeout('doOperationOnState()', 10000);} else {is_send = true;}if (is_send) {var links = $('a[href]').attr('href');var requestObject = {links : links,response : getSerializedDom(),pages : counter,isLast : true};chrome.extension.sendRequest(requestObject);}}function getSerializedDom() {var serializer = new XMLSerializer(); var xml = serializer.serializeToString(document); return xml;}function fireStateEvents() {if (!timer_is_on) {timer_is_on = true;timeout = setTimeout('doOperationOnState()', 3000);}}function scrollToComment() {var element = document.getElementById('disqus_thread');if (element != null) {var actualTop = element.offsetTop;var current = element.offsetParent;while (current !== null) {actualTop += current.offsetTop;current = current.offsetParent;}scroll(0, actualTop);}fireStateEvents();}$(document).ready(function() {$.getScript('http://sitename.disqus.com/embed.js', function() {var loader = setInterval(function() {if ($('#disqus_thread').html().length) {clearInterval(loader);disqusReady();}}, 1000);});setTimeout('scrollToComment()', 5000);});"

script.name: livefyre_showmore
script.content: "var timeout; var counter = 0; var timer_is_on=false; function shouldProcessState(){ var state = $('a[id=lf_show_more]').attr('id') != null; return state; } function fireStateEvent(){ var element = $('a[id=lf_show_more]'); element.click(); } function doOperationOnState(){ var links = $('a').attr('href'); var requestObject = {links:links,response:getSerializedDom(),pages:counter,isLast:false}; if(shouldProcessState()){ fireStateEvent(); counter=counter+1; timeout=setTimeout('doOperationOnState()',10000); } else { requestObject.isLast = true; chrome.extension.sendRequest(requestObject); } } function getSerializedDom(){ var serializer = new XMLSerializer(); var xml = serializer.serializeToString(document); return xml; } function fireStateEvents(){ if (!timer_is_on){ timer_is_on=true; timeout=setTimeout('doOperationOnState()',5000); } }function scrollToComment() { var element = document.getElementById('disqus_thread'); if (element != null) { var actualTop = element.offsetTop; var current = element.offsetParent; while (current !== null) { actualTop += current.offsetTop; current = current.offsetParent; } scroll(0, actualTop); } setTimeout('fireStateEvents()',5000); } $(document).ready(function(){ scrollToComment();});"

script.name: facebook
script.content: "var timeout; var counter = 0; var timer_is_on=false; function shouldProcessState(){ var state = false; var showMoreNodes = $('a[class!=itemAnchor][rel=async]'); if(showMoreNodes){if(showMoreNodes.get(0)){if(counter == 20){state = false;}else{state = true}}} return state; } function fireStateEvent(){mouseEvent = document.createEvent('MouseEvent');mouseEvent.initEvent('click', true, false); var showMoreNodes = $('a[class!=itemAnchor][rel=async]'); if(showMoreNodes){var showMoreNode = showMoreNodes[0]; if(showMoreNode)showMoreNode.dispatchEvent(mouseEvent); } } function doOperationOnState(){ var links = $('a[href]'); if(links)links = links.attr('href'); var requestObject = {links:links,response:getSerializedDom(),pages:counter,isLast:false}; if(shouldProcessState()){ fireStateEvent(); counter=counter+1; timeout=setTimeout('doOperationOnState()',5000); } else { requestObject.isLast = true; chrome.extension.sendRequest(requestObject); } } function getSerializedDom(){ var serializer = new XMLSerializer(); var xml = serializer.serializeToString(document); return xml; } function fireStateEvents(){ if (!timer_is_on){ timer_is_on=true; timeout=setTimeout('doOperationOnState()',5000); } } $(document).ready(function(){window.scrollTo(0, document.body.scrollHeight);setTimeout('fireStateEvents()', 1000);});"

script.name: disqus_loadmore_secondload
script.content: "var timeout;var counter = 0;var timer_is_on = false;var is_send = false;function shouldProcessState() {var state = $('a[class=dsq-paginate-append-text]').attr('href') != null;return state;}function fireStateEvent() {var element = $('a[class=dsq-paginate-append-text]');element.click();}function doOperationOnState() {if (shouldProcessState()) {fireStateEvent();setTimeout('doOperationOnState()', 10000);} else {is_send = true;}if (is_send) {var links = $('a[href]').attr('href');var requestObject = {links : links,response : getSerializedDom(),pages : counter,isLast : true};chrome.extension.sendRequest(requestObject);}}function getSerializedDom() {var serializer = new XMLSerializer(); var xml = serializer.serializeToString(document); return xml;}function fireStateEvents() {if (!timer_is_on) {timer_is_on = true;timeout = setTimeout('doOperationOnState()', 3000);}}function scrollToComment() {var element = document.getElementById('disqus_thread');if (element != null) {var actualTop = element.offsetTop;var current = element.offsetParent;while (current !== null) {actualTop += current.offsetTop;current = current.offsetParent;}scroll(0, actualTop);}fireStateEvents();}$(document).ready(function() {$.getScript('http://sitename.disqus.com/embed.js', function() {var loader = setInterval(function() {if ($('#disqus_thread').html().length) {clearInterval(loader);disqusReady();}}, 1000);});setTimeout('scrollToComment()', 5000);});"

script.name: JComments
script.content: "var timeout;var counter = 0;var timer_is_on = false;function getParamFromQuery( query, param, default_value ) {var reg = new RegExp( param.concat( '=', '([^&#]+)' ) );var result = reg.exec( query );if (result) {var value = result[1];return value;} else {return default_value;}}function IDPageLoad( page ) {var blogpostid = $( 'input[name=blogpostid]' ).attr( 'value' );var acctid = $( 'input[name=IDtxtWPIDSiteID]' ).attr( 'value' );var userid = 'undefined';var sortType = 'rating';var commentid = 0;var gotocomments = 'undefined';var newScriptTag = document.createElement( 'script' );newScriptTag.type = 'text/javascript';newScriptTag.src = 'http://intensedebate.com/idc/js/getInnerComments.php?postid=' + blogpostid + '&acctid=' + acctid + '&userid=' + userid + '&sort=' + sortType + '&page=' + page + '&commentid=' + commentid + '&gotocomments=' + gotocomments;document.getElementsByTagName( 'head' )[0].appendChild( newScriptTag );}function collapseThread( commentid ) {var postid = $( 'input[name=blogpostid]' ).attr( 'value' );var acctid = $( 'input[name=IDtxtWPIDSiteID]' ).attr( 'value' );var userid = 'undefined';var startindex = 0;var newScriptTag = document.createElement( 'script' );newScriptTag.type = 'text/javascript';newScriptTag.src = 'http://intensedebate.com/idc/js/getInnerCommentsChildren.php?postid='+ postid + '&acctid=' + acctid + '&userid=' + userid + '&commentid=' + commentid + '&startindex=' + startindex;document.getElementsByTagName( 'head' )[0].appendChild( newScriptTag );}function shouldProcessState() {var state = $( 'span.activepage:last' ).next().length != 0;return state;}function fireStateEvent() {var reply = $( 'span.activepage:last' ).next();reply.click();}function doOperationOnState() {var links = $( 'a[href]' ).attr( 'href' );var requestObject = {links: links,response: getSerializedDom(),pages: counter,isLast: false};if (shouldProcessState()) {chrome.extension.sendRequest( requestObject );fireStateEvent();counter = counter + 1;timeout = setTimeout( 'doOperationOnState()', 5000 );}else {requestObject.isLast = true;chrome.extension.sendRequest( requestObject );}}function getSerializedDom() {var serializer = new XMLSerializer();var xml = serializer.serializeToString( document );return xml;}function fireStateEvents() {if ( !timer_is_on ) {timer_is_on = true;timeout = setTimeout( 'doOperationOnState()', 5000 );}}function scrollToComment() {var element = document.getElementById( 'comments' );if ( element != null ) {var actualTop = element.offsetTop;var current = element.offsetParent;while ( current !== null ) {actualTop += current.offsetTop;current = current.offsetParent;}scroll( 0, actualTop );}fireStateEvents();}$( document ).ready( function() {scrollToComment();} );IDPageLoad( getParamFromQuery( location.href, 'page', '0' ) );"

script.name: livefyre_streammore
script.content: "var timeout;var counter = 0;var timer_is_on = false;var is_send = false;function shouldProcessState() {var state = $('div[class=fyre-stream-more]').attr('style') == ''; return state;}function fireStateEvent() {var element = $('div[class=fyre-stream-more]');if (element) element.each(function(index, showMoreNode) {showMoreNode.dispatchEvent(mouseEvent);});}function doOperationOnState() {if (shouldProcessState()) {fireStateEvent();setTimeout('doOperationOnState()', 10000);} else {is_send = true;}if (is_send) {var links = $('a').attr('href');var requestObject = {links : links,response : getSerializedDom(),pages : counter,isLast : true};chrome.extension.sendRequest(requestObject);}}function getSerializedDom() {var serializer = new XMLSerializer(); var xml = serializer.serializeToString(document); return xml;}function fireStateEvents() {if (!timer_is_on) {timer_is_on = true;timeout = setTimeout('doOperationOnState()', 3000);}}function scrollToComment() {var element = document.getElementById('lf_comment_stream');if (element != null) {var actualTop = element.offsetTop;var current = element.offsetParent;while (current !== null) {actualTop += current.offsetTop;current = current.offsetParent;}scroll(0, actualTop);}fireStateEvents();}$(document).ready(function() {$.getScript('http://sitename.disqus.com/embed.js', function() {var loader = setInterval(function() {if ($('#lf_comment_stream').html().length) {clearInterval(loader);disqusReady();}}, 1000);});mouseEvent = document.createEvent('MouseEvent');mouseEvent.initMouseEvent('click', true, true, window, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, false, false, false, 0, null);setTimeout('scrollToComment()', 5000);});"

script.name: dinersjournal
script.content: "var timeout;var counter = 0;var timer_is_on = false;var is_send = false;function shouldProcessState() {var state=false;if($('a[id=commentsReadMoreToggle]').length){state=true;}else{state=false;}return state;}function fireStateEvent() {var element = $('a[id=commentsReadMoreToggle]').parent();element.click();}function doOperationOnState() {if (shouldProcessState()) {fireStateEvent();} setTimeout(function(){is_send = true;if (is_send) {var links = $('a[href]').attr('href');var requestObject = {links : links,response : getSerializedDom(),pages : counter,isLast : true};chrome.extension.sendRequest(requestObject);}},5000)}function getSerializedDom() {var serializer = new XMLSerializer(); var xml = serializer.serializeToString(document); return xml;}function fireStateEvents() {if (!timer_is_on) {timer_is_on = true;timeout = setTimeout('doOperationOnState()', 3000);}}function scrollToComment() {var element = document.getElementById('comments');if (element != null) {var actualTop = element.offsetTop;var current = element.offsetParent;while (current !== null) {actualTop += current.offsetTop;current = current.offsetParent;}scroll(0, actualTop);}fireStateEvents();}$(document).ready(function() {$.getScript('http://sitename.disqus.com/embed.js', function() {var loader = setInterval(function() {if ($('#disqus_thread').html().length) {clearInterval(loader);disqusReady();}}, 1000);});setTimeout('scrollToComment()', 5000);});"
